description: This file defines a retry mechanism for a tool function within an agent-based framework, including a pre-hook for retries and a tool function that prints and yields a message.

methods.name: pre_hook
methods.description: A pre-hook function that prints information about the FunctionCall and raises a RetryAgentRun exception if called less than twice.

methods.name: print_something
methods.description: A tool function that prints a string and yields a confirmation message.
